questions.questionText: The Amazon River flows through Brazil.
Africa is the largest continent by area.
Mount Kilimanjaro is located in Tanzania.
The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.
The Sahara Desert is in South America.
The American Civil War ended in 1865.
The Great Wall of China was built in the 20th century.
The Roman Empire fell in 476 AD.
Queen Victoria was the first ruler of the United Kingdom.
The Cold War was a conflict between the USA and the USSR.
Mark Twain wrote 'The Adventures of Tom Sawyer'.
George Orwell authored 'Pride and Prejudice'.
Jane Austen is the author of 'Emma'.
Homer wrote 'The Iliad'.
F. Scott Fitzgerald wrote '1984'.
The Beatles were a British band.
Beethoven was a famous violinist.
Michael Jackson was known as the 'King of Pop'.
Freddie Mercury was the lead singer of Queen.
Mozart was born in Austria.
Water boils at 100Â°C at sea level.
The human body has 206 bones.
The speed of sound is faster than the speed of light.
Photosynthesis occurs in plants.
Atoms are made up of protons, neutrons, and electrons.
Soccer is also known as football in most countries.
The Olympic Games are held every 2 years.
The Super Bowl is the championship game of American football.
The FIFA World Cup is held every 4 years.
Roger Federer is a famous basketball player.
The first iPhone was released in 2007.
Python is a type of database.
The World Wide Web was invented by Tim Berners-Lee.
HTML is used for creating web pages.
Blockchain is a type of programming language.
